mapper.select: SELECT SYS_ID , WEBSVC_KND , SITE_URL , TO_CHAR(CREAT_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CREAT_DT , MNGR_NM , MNGR_EMAIL_ADRES , FRST_REGISTER_ID , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , LAST_UPDUSR_ID , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM FROM COMTNHTTPMON WHERE SYS_ID = #{sysId}

SELECT A.LOG_ID , A.SYS_ID , A.WEBSVC_KND , A.SITE_URL , B.CODE_NM HTTP_STTUS_CODE , TO_CHAR(A.CREAT_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CREAT_DT , A.LOG_INFO , A.MNGR_NM , A.MNGR_EMAIL_ADRES , A.FRST_REGISTER_ID , A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID , A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM FROM COMTHHTTPMONLOGINFO A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE B ON B.CODE_ID = 'COM072' AND A.HTTP_STTUS_CODE = B.CODE WHERE A.WEBSVC_KND = #{webKind} AND A.LOG_ID = #{logId}
